product_overview: Beep Manager is a premium store management application tailored for store owners and managers. It centralizes essential functions like communication, scheduling, task management, and attendance tracking into a sleek, intuitive platform with real-time synchronization and a polished UI/UX design.
core_goals: Provide a secure and seamless authentication system for users to access the platform.
Deliver a comprehensive home dashboard offering quick access to all key operational features.
Enable reliable attendance management with precise location verification and smooth user interaction.
Support real-time communication and calendar management for enhanced coordination among store staff.
Create an elegant, responsive UI based on modern design principles including glassmorphism and 3D icons, supporting both light and dark modes.
key_features: Authentication system supporting email/password login with session management.
Home dashboard with 3D-styled menu items linking to Messenger, Calendar, Handover, Checklist, Attendance, and Settings.
Attendance feature includes clock-in/out functionality with GPS and Wi-Fi verification ensuring user presence at store location.
Real-time Messenger allowing channel-based chat synchronization across multiple devices.
Calendar view displaying monthly events with support for adding and editing events with real-time updates.
Handover module for recording and sharing daily operational notes and work logs.
Checklist feature for operational safety checks during opening and closing shifts.
Profile and Store Settings management allowing users to customize their profiles and store-specific configurations.
Technical architecture leveraging the Flet framework with a custom router for navigation and real-time synchronization handled through polling and service handlers.
user_flow_summary: User logs in via the authentication system using email and password; upon success, the app routes to the Home Dashboard.

From the Home Dashboard, users navigate to different modules: Messenger for chatting, Calendar for event management, Handover for daily notes, Checklist for safety tasks, Attendance for clock-in/out, and Settings for profile/store management.
During Attendance, users interact with a premium UI to clock in or out with verification via GPS or Wi-Fi ensuring presence.
In Messenger, users join real-time channels to communicate with team members, with messages synchronized across sessions.
Users manage store events in Calendar by viewing monthly schedules, adding new events, or editing existing ones with immediate synchronization.
Users record daily operational notes in Handover to share relevant information with colleagues.
Checklist module guides users through critical compliance steps for opening and closing store operations.
Users update their profile or store preferences in Settings, enabling personalized and location-specific configurations.
validation_criteria: Users must authenticate successfully and retain active sessions for smooth navigation.
Dashboard menu items must correctly route users to their respective features without delay or errors.
Attendance clock-in/out actions are verified by GPS and Wi-Fi to match the userâ€™s location and must update status in real-time with visual feedback.
Messenger channels synchronize messages in real-time across multiple logged-in devices ensuring message consistency.
Calendar events display correctly in monthly view and support real-time add/edit functionality without sync errors.
Handover notes are reliably saved, retrievable, and sharable with other users in the system.
Checklist tasks must accurately reflect completion state and reset appropriately between shifts.
Profile and store settings changes persist correctly and influence app behavior as expected.
The UI adheres strictly to design standards including glassmorphism effects, gradient usage, responsive layout, and light/dark mode consistency.
Navigation flow uses the custom router to maintain state integrity and prevent history or path errors during view transitions.
